item.description:
BREAKING: Rust Mobile is now available for global pre-registration on Android and iOS devices, with a hands-on demo coming to Gamescom 2025.
Pre-Register: https://rustmobile.com
#RustMobile

BREAKING: Sony is suing Tencent, claiming its upcoming game, Light of Motiram, is a "slavish clone" of the "valuable" Horizon franchise!
Sony alleges Tencent tried to license the IP, and when refused, proceeded with the "knock-off."
#LightofMotiram

TENCENT: Party Stars' Palworld-like mode is receiving a new round of testing in China.
A Chinese mobile phone number and a QQ or WeChat account are required.
#PartyStars
